lemma v_eq_0_coinduct[consumes 3, case_names valid nS2 cont]: assumes *: "P cfg" assumes valid: "\<And>cfg. P cfg \<Longrightarrow> cfg \<in> valid_cfg" assumes nS2: "\<And>cfg. P cfg \<Longrightarrow> state cfg \<notin> S2" assumes cont: "\<And>cfg cfg'. P cfg \<Longrightarrow> state cfg \<in> S1 \<Longrightarrow> cfg' \<in> K_cfg cfg \<Longrightarrow> P cfg' \<or> v cfg' = 0" shows "v cfg = 0"
